Articles.Content: Share your flag plaque texts! What have you left for others to read on distant worlds?

Um...

My Kethane base is something like...

"KETHANE BASE. KEEP OUT DAMN KERBALS!"

...

Sorry then.

Edited August 4, 2013 by Tommygun

-snip-

He's talking about the plaques you wrote on them.
Mines some emotional stuff about venturing forward... whatever comes to mind

I had a few recently:

"Starbucks coming soon."

"If found please call 1-800-4581. Ask for Jeb."
Today's plaque reads, "We Came In Pieces For All Kerbalkind"

I stuck a flag at the end of the KSC runway so I can find it in the dark:

"KSC

Jebidiah says: LAND HERE DAMMIT"
my first landing one says "Finally!"

my first Mun landing in .21 is pretty boring:

Ã‚Â¦ On this site, Titan 5 touched down with Jebidiah Kerman. "we came in the name of curiosity... got lost, and ended up here." - Jeb Ã‚Â¦

my first Mun landing in .21 is pretty boring:

Ã‚Â¦ On this site, Titan 5 touched down with Jebidiah Kerman. "we came in the name of curiosity... got lost, and ended up here." - Jeb Ã‚Â¦
"I was here looking for some snacks..."

Not on Distant Worlds, exactly. Linked because they reveal the nature of a pair of Kerbin easter eggs.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/4057920/Kerbal%20Space%20Program/V0.20/Screenshots/screenshot291.png

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/4057920/Kerbal%20Space%20Program/V0.20/Screenshots/screenshot318.png
"go away. no wreckage to see here"
"We came in peace for some reason or another."
I stick to a generic idea of saying what the landing was, who did it, what craft was used, and any special tidbits, like if it was a rescue mission, and so forth.
Usually something along the lines of "blablabla we came in peace for most of kerbalkind".
My first Mun plaque details the landing in much detail, and then states that the flag was not planted because of the Mun landing, but because of the new flag-planting technology that was developed.

my first Mun landing in .21 is pretty boring:

Ã‚Â¦ On this site, Titan 5 touched down with Jebidiah Kerman. "we came in the name of curiosity... got lost, and ended up here." - Jeb Ã‚Â¦

Is Jebidiah any relation to the famous Jebediah?

The last flag I planted read:

"Now you know how Scott felt when he finally reached the South Pole!"

Edited August 4, 2013 by Scarecrow88
These are fun. Keep 'em coming.

I landed on the southern snow cap of duna,

"It appears we've landed on snow-like snow, what? If you wanted poetry maybe you should of come out here yourself" -Kelbo

On Kerbin's North Pole:

"Jeb said Kerbal Klaus lived up here. But there's nothing here. Why would he lie to me like that! Whyyyy!?"

After my first v.20 landing on the Mun:

"First landing of Kerbal-kind on another world. In memory of Jebediah Kerman, and Bob Kerman who died so that others may triumph. And also Ansel Kerman who died stupidly trying to plant a flag for Jeb and Bob."

And a Futurama reference:

"We're whalers on Minmuuus!"

My last landing had something slightly Kerbal in nature.

"Shoot for the Mun. Even if you miss, you'll land on Minmus, like we did."

Technically, they DIDN'T miss the Mun, it was a Mun orbit to Minmus.

Edited August 5, 2013 by spink00
extra detail

I'll share one, since it's not much of a spoiler anyway:

Placed by: Bill Kerman

The mk1pod was a workhorse which helped the Kerbal Space Program reach new heights in its early days, but is now only useful for sitting on a plinth covered in concrete (it was cheaper than making a replica out of concrete).

Is Jebidiah any relation to the famous Jebediah?[...]

It's his cousin.

[...]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/4057920/Kerbal%20Space%20Program/V0.20/Screenshots/screenshot318.png

What's the name of the plugin next to the Kerbal Alarm Clock icon?
